summary: The Child Care and Development Fund gives grants to states to subsidize child care for low-income families so parents can go to work, school, or job training. This is our 5th report on who is eligible for the subsidies and who got them. The number of children getting subsidies declined from 2 million in 2019 and 2020 to 1.8 million in 2021—about 15% of those...
title: Child Care: Subsidy Eligibility and Use and State Waiver Requests Related to New Program Requirements
